portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: さっきは剣の修理ありがとな 前よりダンゼン斬れ味が良くなったぞ
portrait_r.ascii: Thank you for repairing my sword! It's far sharper than before!

portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: ヴィーねえさんに ありがとうって言っといてくれ
portrait_r.ascii: Please give my thanks to Miss V.E as well.

portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: お前もねえさんの片ウデになれるよう ちゃんと修行すンだぞ

portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: 良い返事だ 今日はキゲンがいいから 特別にこれをやるよ
portrait_r.ascii: Good answer! I'm in a good mood today, so here, take this.

male.sjis: これ、武器の材料だ！ くれるの！？
male.ascii: This is synthesis material! You sure I can have it!?

female.sjis: これ、武器の材料！ もらっちゃっていいの！？
female.ascii: This is synthesis material! Are you sure I can have it!?

portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: オレの鉄鉱石だからな 店の商品じゃねぇ 気にしないで取っときな
portrait_r.ascii: Of course you can. This Iron Ore is a gift from me, not the store's stocks.

portrait_r.name: chief
portrait_r.sjis: ありがとよ でも今回だけ特別だからな ヴィーねえさんにはナイショな
portrait_r.ascii: Haha, thanks! But it's just this one time. Keep it a secret from Miss V.E!

male.sjis: これで材料はそろったぞ！ 帰って武器をつくろう！
male.ascii: That'll be enough materials! Time to go home and craft a weapon!

female.sjis: 材料がそろっちゃった！ 帰って武器をつくろう！
female.ascii: I got the materials! Time to go home and craft a weapon!
